description._content: TITLE Adams, Daniel of Keene NH CREATOR SUBJECT Men - NH - Keene DESCRIPTION Photograph of Daniel Adams of Keene New Hampshire. He was born in 1773 in Townshend MA and graduated from Dartmouth in 1797. He taught school in Keene and then moved on to other towns before returning to Keene in 1846. He published several text books. He married Nancy Mulliken of Townsend MA and they had 5 children. He served 3 terms as a state senator and died in Keene in 1864. PUBLISHER Keene Public Library DATE DIGITAL 20080229 DATE ORIGINAL RESOURCE TYPE photographs FORMAT image/jpg RESOURCE IDENTIFIER hsykppl019 RIGHTS MANAGMENT No known restriction on publication.
